org.sql: SELECT follows.target_account_id FROM follows WHERE follows.account_id = "$1" AND follows.target_account_id = "$2" AND follows.show_reblogs = "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT follows.target_account_id FROM follows WHERE follows.account_id = "$1" AND follows.target_account_id = "$2" AND follows.show_reblogs = "$3" LIMIT 1
